trends: There have been 6 other sightings in Salem
There were no other sightings in Salem on or around January 27th 2009
divs: Sighting DetailsHello, My name is Santos and I would like to share a sighting I happen to witness. I was driving on my way to work on the morning of Tuesday January 27, 2009. I was driving southbound on route 93 around the border of New Hampshire and Massachusetts. It was still a bit dark with a bit of a sunrise. When driving this morning, I notice, what I thought was an airplane just beneath the clouds. What captured my attention was that the aircraft appear to be falling from the sky. I said to myself " my god! an airplane is falling!" The problem here was the object dropped vertically with control, defying gravity. This is when it was clear to me to be a UFO. This object then climbed back up vertically, then traveled up in a 45��� angle and flew out of the sky at a enormous rate of speed. At this point I asked myself. "what did I just see?" For me there is no other explanation.....I witnessed a UFO! The object was a bright round glowing circle and was floating in the sky like a balloon (kinda like a light bulb in the sky). I was thrown back by the technology, this was not from this planet. I wasn't afraid, if anything I was amazed and impressed. I really hope to see this again someday. I don't have any videos or pics , the event lasted for about 7-10 seconds. If you have any questions you would like to ask, please feel free. Thanks.
Object Flight Path: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
